metadata.title: CVE-2024-44944 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: ctnetlink: use helper function to calculate expect IDDelete expectation path is missing a call to the nf_expect_get_id()helper function to calculate the expectation ID, otherwise LSB of theexpectation object address is leaked to userspace.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-44944` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-extra-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-262-generic - 4.4.0-262.296~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-262-generic - 4.4.0-262.296~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-262-lowlatency - 4.4.0-262.296~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro with Legacy support add-on: https://ubuntu.com/pro

Available with Ubuntu Pro with Legacy support add-on: https://ubuntu.com/pro
